game.name: Stickman Boxing KO Champion
game.description:
Are you brave enough to enter the ring and take your opponent down in just a few punches? Do you think you have the skill to fight for your honor? It is time to stretch your muscles hard, give yourself a bit warm up and get into an amazing ring battle. Your opponent is very cold hearted and not going to show sympathy on you. Go ahead and lie your rival down in a brand new sports challenge “Stickman Boxing KO Champion”!
Challenges and difficulties will continue rising round by round. Practice all your boxing moves to last longer in the ring. Not only tapping works for you. You also have to learn how to cover yourself when your opponent hits on your face. Do not forget to give him right and left hook if needed in this cool boxing game! Use cross, jab, uppercut and apply dodging to earn a much needed win! The proper use of a wide range of devastating combos and punches will make your way to victory. 
Do not forget to get up fast in case if you see yourself lying on the ground! Remember you will have only 10 seconds to come back and unleash your fierce combos and punches. Test your reflexes and ultimate boxing skills to go through all levels and become a real boxer in this cool html5 intense combat game! Practice for several minutes to conquer all the major difficulties! Common friends! It is a wonderful chance to be the best fighting master! Good luck to gain the victory in your style! Check out more online stickman games for free here on atmegame.com!
